subject: Hello, my name is Emily Port
body:
Hello, my name is Emily Portney, and I'm here to have a conversation
with you about an amazing opportunity that will be extremely
beneficial to us. Please reply to me if you're interested in figuring
out more about the details of the transaction.
Regards
Emily Portney
Attention

subject: Re:   Hello, my name is Emily Port
body:
Hello Emily, 

It's nice to meet you! I'm always interested in hearing about new opportunities. Could you please provide more details about what you're offering?

Best wishes,
Annie

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Emily Port
body:
My name is Emily Portney, CEO of BNY Mellon's Asset Servicing. I was very
close friends with the late American citizen engineer Richard D. Petrelli.
On July 7, 2013, he died in an automobile accident that took place right
here in New York. On July 20, 2014, an oil consultant for American
Petroleum Corporation made a numbered time (Fixed) Deposit for
US$155,000,000 for a period of twelve calendar months. (In US dollars, one
hundred and fifty-five million) After these many futile attempts, I made
the decision to hunt and find his relatives online, but to no success. I
found your email in a business guestbook, and I have a strong intuition
that you are a trustworthy individual. I can rely on you to complete this
deal without raising the American Government's concerns about the sizable
sum of money that Late Engineer Richard D. Petrelli fought hard for and
deservedly owned. (He was a good man who, unaware that he would soon die,
thought he could build the largest chemical firm in the United States right
here in New York.)

I reached out to you so that we might work together to repatriate the
deceased's funds, which were held in an account at my bank with a balance
of about US$155,000,000, before they were seized or declared in this
location. (In US dollars, one hundred and fifty-five million) As a result,
I received a notification from the bank advising me to provide the next of
kin or else his account might be frozen. I need your permission to name you
as the deceased's last remaining next of kin (you don't have to share the
same last name with him to do this), so that the account's
US$155,000,000.00 value can be paid to you and we can split it equally,
with 50% going to you and 50% for me, since I have been unable to contact
the relatives for more than a year. With your participation and assistance,
we will get the legal records necessary to establish the claim that is in
your favor. You only need to participate sincerely and honestly if you want
to help me with my business. I guarantee that this will be done in
accordance with a written agreement that will protect you from any legal
infringements. Please provide the information requested below so that we
can continue our conversation. I appreciate your consideration of my advice.
Full name:
Address:
Phone:
Occupation:

Thanks for your kind cooperation
Regards
Emily Portney

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Emily Port
body:
Hello Emily Portney,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. I'm sorry to hear about the unfortunate demise of Richard D. Petrelli. It's always sad when someone passes away unexpectedly.

I must say, your proposal is quite intriguing and it's not every day that one gets an opportunity like this. However, I have a few questions before we proceed further.

Firstly, how did you come across my email in the business guestbook? Secondly, could you provide more details about the legal procedures involved in claiming these funds? Lastly, what kind of written agreement are we talking about here?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Annie

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Emily Port
body:
This is to formally acknowledge receipt of your email and the content
therein. To be completely honest with you, I have been looking for the
deceased relatives for the past six years, but to no avail. The government
has already given me some months to find or notify the next of kin of the
deceased's funds; if I fail to do so, the funds will be confiscated and
claimed by the government. I do not want his laboriously earned money to be
transferred to the government's holding account. Since there is no next of
kin listed on the account where the money is located, it makes it difficult
for me to allow the government to claim his hard-earned money. He was a
good friend of mine when he was alive and is an honorable man whom any
right-thinking person will look up to with trust and dignity.

When he was alive, he always had the best interests of Americans in mind
and would always support initiatives that would benefit all American
people. Because of this, I prefer that we spend the remaining money to aid
the underprivileged Americans rather than letting the government take it.
I'm the CEO of BNY Mellon's Asset Servicing, as I mentioned in my earlier
email, and with your help and cooperation, along with my position within
the bank, I'll be able to obtain the crucial legal records that may be used
to support the claim in your favor. To make this arrangement happen, all I
need is your real and sincere collaboration. I promise that this will be
carried out in accordance with legal agreements that will safeguard you
from any legal violations.

I can guarantee you that this is not a con, and we will split any fees
necessary to complete this transaction equally (you pay half while I pay
the other half). I guarantee you with my life that you won't regret helping
us do this. Please see my ID below, along with a few more documents that
will be delivered to you for review when you agree to do this transaction
with me. Print the Memorandum of Understanding, fill it out, and email it
back to me so that we may go on to the next stage of this transaction. To
enable us to continue our conversation, kindly enter the details provided
below.

Full Name,
Address,
Phone,
Occupation.
I appreciate your thoughtful assistance.
Regards
CEO of Asset Servicing
Emily Portney

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Emily Port
body:
Hello Emily,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. I must say, it's quite a unique situation you've found yourself in. It's admirable that you're trying to honor your friend's memory by ensuring his hard-earned money is used for the benefit of the people rather than being claimed by the government.

I'm curious about a few things though. How did you come across my contact information? And why do you believe I would be the right person to help with this matter?

Also, could you please provide more details about what exactly would be required of me in this process? You mentioned some legal agreements - could you elaborate on what these might entail?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Annie

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Emily Port
body:
Hello Emily,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. I must say, it's quite a unique situation you've found yourself in. It's admirable that you're trying to honor your friend's memory by ensuring his hard-earned money is used for the benefit of the people rather than being claimed by the government.

I'm curious about how you plan to use these funds to aid people? Also, could you please explain more about the legal agreements that will safeguard me from any legal issues?

I appreciate your assurance that this isn't a con, but I would like to understand more about the process before making any commitments. Could you provide more details on what exactly my role would be in this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Annie

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Emily Port
body:
Thank you for responding. As I mentioned in my last email, I obtained your
email address from a business guestbook, so there's no big deal here. You
should feel secure knowing that you're in my capable hands. The legal
procedure I refer to is the one we will utilize to obtain the necessary
legal paperwork from the bank; you don't need to worry because I will
supply them personally when requested by the bank.

I hope you understand what I'm trying to accomplish, which is to present
you as the next of kin so that we can claim the fund. Please note that you
don't have to be physically present in the bank to get this done. If you
read my previous email, I provided you with some details about what you're
to do in this transaction.
Regards

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Emily Port
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your email and the detailed explanation. I appreciate your efforts in this matter. However, I'm a bit confused about the process. Could you please elaborate on how exactly we will obtain the necessary legal paperwork from the bank? And what kind of documents are we talking about here?

Also, could you please explain more about presenting me as the next of kin? How does that work exactly? 

I'm sorry for all these questions but I just want to make sure I understand everything correctly.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Annie

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Emily Port
body:
I'll tell you to get in touch with the bank, and if they ask for any
documentation, I'll make sure I obtain it legally. As the next of kin, you
will inform the bank that you are Richard's surviving family member and
that they should provide you instructions on how to collect the money. I
hope this has made more sense to you.
Regards

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Emily Port
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate the information you've shared with me about being Richard's surviving family member and the process of collecting money from the bank. 

I'm a bit curious though, how did you come to know about Richard? And could you please elaborate more on the process of obtaining this legally? I'm not very familiar with these things, so any additional details would be really helpful.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Annie

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Emily Port
body:
Thanks for your email, from the look of things it's becoming obvious that
you have not been reading my email, please go through our conversation for
proper understanding. Thanks
Regards

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Emily Port
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your response. I must apologize if it seems like I haven't been fully understanding your emails. I assure you, I've been reading them thoroughly.

Could you please clarify which part of our previous correspondence you feel I may have misunderstood? This will help me to better grasp the information and respond more accurately.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Annie

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Emily Port
Re: Hello, my name is Emily Port
body:
Hello there,

I hope this message finds you well. I've read your email and found it quite interesting. Could you please provide more details about the topic? I'm eager to learn more.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Annie
